text: Hagi ana ava'nafima ke'nanana, ana amema'amofo agia ainireti'ene higoreti'ene eri havia hu'za tro hu'naze. E'inama hu'neana, agafa'amo'a amanahu hu'ne. Ana kini ne'mo'ma kegavama hu'nesnia vahe'mo'za zamagrare zamagrare hu'za otitere hugahazankino, mago'amoza aenigna huza hankavenetisageno, mago'amo'za hankave otigahaze.
